ValidationRule.description: Making field New_Equipment_Quantity__c required to be filled in on any opp at the Solve stage or beyond for Surgical Record types
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( RecordTypeId='012C0000000QLX0', RecordTypeId='012C0000000Urae'), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Solve") , ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Execute" ) , ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Closed Won" ) ), (ISBLANK( New_Equipment_Quantity__c )
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "New Equipment Quantity" is required for this Opportunity Stage
